item.title: [from Florence import PyCon] Public speaking workshop
item.description: Public Speaking workshop with Lorenzo Barbieri lorenzo.barbieri@outlook.com Tl;dr STOP putting an about me part in your presentation. STOP boring your audience with useless information. GIVE VALUE to your audience to make them happy and satisfied of hearing you speaking. Full version Here you’ll find some advices for speaking in public. They’re particularly meant for sessions outside a company (for example at a conference), but they can be also applied to internal meeting in some cases.
